title: Eat Popcorn Out of Galactus’ Big Ol’ Head at AMC Theaters

Eat Popcorn Out of Galactus’ Big Ol’ Head at AMC Theaters

Marvel Studios dials the bucket game back up with 'The Fantastic Four: First Steps' and also adds a HERBIE mega snack holder.
By Sabina Graves Published June 4, 2025 | Comments (22) |
𝕏
Copied!

Soon, you can buy Galactus‘ giant noggin overflowing with popcorn. Coming in at 17.5 inches tall and 20 inches wide, that’s a lot of handfuls to get you through all of The Fantastic Four: First Steps, the credits, and of course—any post-credit scenes in this summer’s Marvel Studios release.

Check out the teaser for the popcorn bucket! Fair warning for those of you looking to go in blind to the movie, there are some minor sizzle clips of footage from The Fantastic Four: First Steps.

I’m excited for this giant “vessel”—though it’s a missed opportunity to feature Galactus holding a cracked-open planet—especially since I’ve been on the hunt for one big enough to be a cool-looking recycling bin for my car.  Hey, it’s practical and about time to retire my Ghostbusters ghost (trash) trap.

Additionally AMC Theaters will also be featuring another mega snack container in the form of HERBIE. The unofficial member of the Fantastic Four family can join yours as not only a popcorn receptacle, but also a candy holder with a sippy drink head. The ambitious 3-in-1 robotic snackage companion looks really cute but we don’t want to ruin the build with soda syrup; it kinda seems like a bad idea to just let gunk seep into the cracks. Maybe it should have just had a cup holder molded into the back of the head.

Take a look at the two exciting popcorn bucket upgrades and the rest of AMC’s line up which includes character cups and popcorn tins.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters July 25.

Want more io9 news? Check out when to expect the latest Marvel, Star Wars, and Star Trek releases, what’s next for the DC Universe on film and TV, and everything you need to know about the future of Doctor Who.

rewritten:
Get Ready to Nosh on Popcorn from Galactus’ Enormous Dome at AMC Theaters

Marvel Studios cranks up the popcorn game with 'The Fantastic Four: First Steps' and rolls out a snazzy HERBIE mega munchie holder.

By Sabina Graves Published June 4, 2025 | Comments (22)

Fancy stuffing your face with an almost planet-sized portion of buttery goodness? Soon you can grab a colossal Galactus head overflowing with popcorn. Standing tall at 17.5 inches and spanning 20 inches wide, this mighty container ensures you've got plenty to snack on throughout 'The Fantastic Four: First Steps', right through the credits—and don’t forget any extra surprises after that!

Catch a glimpse of this behemoth in their teaser—though be warned, for those wishing to avoid spoilers there might just be some sneak peeks into the film itself! Personally, I’m pumped about getting my hands on such an "extravagant carrier"—albeit missing the opportunity for it showcasing Galactus splitting open worlds—as I've been seeking something stylish yet sizable enough to transform into my car's quirky recycling bin. My old ‘Ghostbusters’ ghost trap has done its time as trash keeper!

Plus, make room because AMC Theaters is debuting another giant treat receptacle shaped like HERBIE—the beloved honorary member of Marvel’s superhero family joins you not only as a vessel for popcorn but also holds candy while sporting a sippy cup lid—a charming trif
